name: Can I fly to EVERY DELTA HUB Airport in 24 HOURS?
description:
Delta Air Lines operates seven hub airports: Atlanta, Detroit, Minneapolis, Los Angeles, Seattle, Salt Lake City, and New York JFK. I'll attempt to visit them all…in ONE day!

In this video, we'll answer the question: Can I fly to every delta hub airport in 24 hours?
 
We’re calling this Aviation Marathon, “Hub Hopping, Delta Edition!” And it was one of the most epic and challenging travel days!
 
With six connections, six airplanes and six crews, not to mention seven airports, plus who knows how many weather systems. A LOT could go wrong. 
 
But, did I make it? Keep watching to find out!
